name: Capricious Visage
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext:
Even a faint smile could not conceal her sorrow.
Though this is a festive day, it seems more like a farewell...
